name: Attaain
overview: Attaain delivers “active intelligence for strategic advantage” with AttaainCI, the comprehensive web-based solution for researching, analyzing and real-time tracking of competitive intelligence and market intelligence about companies, people and markets. The AttaainCI competitive intelligence software as a service (SaaS) tracks key competitors, sales prospects, customers, potential partners, target markets, industry people and more, across single or multiple lines of business.

milestones.description: Attaain Inc., has been presented the 2009 Innovation Award at the NewVa Corridor Technology Council (NCTC) TechNite Awards, an annual gathering of technology professionals in recognition of entrepreneurial and innovation leadership. The Innovation Award
milestones.source_description: Attaain, Inc., Wins Innovation Award at 2009 NewVa Corridor Technology Council TechNite Awards
